com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.debug

Class DebugRendererBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.Component
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.debug.DebugRendererBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxDebugRenderer, CircleDebugRenderer, EllipseDebugRenderer, XDebugRenderer

    public abstract class DebugRendererBase
extends Component
    The base class for all debug renderers.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer shapeRenderer,
                          GameCamera gameCamera)
        Concrete subclasses must implement this method to define how they are rendered. Note: this method is only called for shape type supported by the subclass. This means a subclass can disallow change of shape type if it only supports a particular type of shape
        Parameters:
        shapeRenderer - a ShapeRenderer that can be used for rendering shapes
        gameCamera - the game camera provided by the scene where the host game object resides
